description: W3534-220001 Invasive Plant Management for the Real Property Operations Unit - Pacific - Region 1
full_summary:
### W3534-220001_B: Invasive Plant Management for the Real Property Operations Unit

**Procurement Notice**
================spot Noise?!

### Procurement Details
-------------------

*   **Tender Reference:** WS3861500406-Doc4502391237
*   **Amendment Number:** 1
*   **Publication Date:** April 11, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date:** April 30, 2024 2:00 PM (Eastern Time)
*   **Expiry Date:** April 30, 2024

### Contract Details
---------------------

*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** May 10, 2023
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** May 9, 2025
*   **Procurement Category:** Services (SRV)
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive Bidding

### Description of Requirements
-----------------------------

The Department of National Defense is seeking a contractor to manage invasive plant species in the Pacific Region. The contract will be for approximately 2 years, with a possible extension for an additional year. The contractor will be responsible for identifying and controlling invasive plant species in accordance with established protocols.

### Areas of Delivery
---------------------

The work will be performed in Chilliwack.

### Location of Contracting Entity
-------------------------------

The contracting entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), located in Gatineau, Quebec, Canada.

### Contact Information
----------------------

To obtain further information, contact Seeto, Kenny (SPAC/PSPC) at kenny.seeto@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

[Full details and requirements](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19378281?extsite=MTkzNzgyODFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Note: 
The RFP is expired. You may not request a quote unless you are a registered contractor and this is the correct request. Please contact Seeto, Kenny to confirm the requirements of the expired file before submitting a new tender.

:j.a.
